metadata.title: CVE-2023-25950 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
HTTP request/response smuggling vulnerability in HAProxy version 2.7.0, and2.6.1 to 2.6.7 allows a remote attacker to alter a legitimate user'srequest. As a result, the attacker may obtain sensitive information orcause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 2.6.9-1ubuntu1
vim-haproxy - 2.6.9-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: haproxy package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.9-1ubuntu1').
